quick shown in fisherman for red santa hat body 25-55 yards/23-50 meters b- wool ease thick & quick shown in cranberry us13 9 0mm 16 41cm circular knitting needles or size needed to obtain gauge us13 9 0mm dpn for decreasing row or circular needles using magic loop method or size to obtain gauge 2 cardboard pom pom makers see instructions on how to make your own on page 5 row counter stitch marker tapestry needle scissors gauge 10 stitches = 4 in stockinette stitch on us13 9 0mm circular knitting needles *important before making your santa hat be sure to knit a gauge swatch in stockinette stitch on circular needles to insure proper sizing abbreviations k knit p purl k2tog knit 2 stitches together at the same time page 1 the santa cutie hat knitting instructions this will be knit in the round on the smaller size hat you can use dpn or 16 41cm length and up circular needles using the magic loop method follow instructions according to the size hat you are making 0-3mos 3-6mos 6-12mos 12-24mos 24-48mos 5-10yrs adult with color a & us13 9 0mm circular needles or dpn cast on 24 28 32 36 40 44 48 stitches join in the round being careful not to twist stitches and place stitch marker at beginning of round brim row 1 k1 p1 till end of round row 2 p1 k1 till end of round repeat row 1 & 2 until you have 6 7 8 9 10 11 12 row total hat body join in color b the rest of the hat from this point forward will be made using color b work 10 11 12 13 14 15 16 rounds of k till end of round page 2 the santa cutie hat decreasing rounds *transfer all your stitches evenly onto us13 9 0mm dpn or stay on your circular needles using the magic loop method see a tutorial on the magic loop method here http //www creatiknit com/archives/how-to-magic-loop-knitting-tutorial/ start on the row according to the size hat you are knitting for example if you are making size 24-48mos you will start on row 5 and continue finishing on row 21 follow instructions according to the size hat you are
